summary: J. Donald CAPRA, M.D. was born in Burlington, Vermont, U.S.A. He studied at the University of Vermont Chenistry and Medicine. His main area of interest was methyl deficient transfer RNA (MDRT) He is a professor of Microbiology and Internal Medicine at Texas Health Science Center at Dallas.
